page.title: 15Y.O.C.BONAR BRIDGE
page.content: The{Young Ornithologists Club}in {Bonar Bridge}is run by two ladies on {Saturday mornings.}We come to the school every second Saturday. Each week we study a different bird. At the start we have a competition with binoculars. There is a board up at the top of the corridor and a table at the other end. There are pictures of birds on the board and you have to try and name them. Then we are asked what birds we have seen. Then we have juice. After that we play a few games. Then the competition winners get their prizes. There are a lot of people go birdwatching and we all enjoy it very much.
